description.value:
Through regular practice in wrestling, boxing, or engaging in some form of martial arts, you have mastered techniques that allow you to efficiently fight without the use of weapons. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your unarmed strikes deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 + your STRâ€”instead of the standard 1 + your STR.

  • You have advantage on ability checks made to initiate or escape a grapple.
